<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">

    var hotelCoordinates = new Array(1000);
    var hotelInd = 0;
    var cityMap;
    function mapStart() {
        var coordinates = new google.maps.LatLng('52.523405', '13.411400');
        if( coordinates == null || (coordinates.lat() == 0 && coordinates.lng() == 0))
        {
            var geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();
            var regionAddress = "Berlin, Germany";
            geocoder.geocode({ address: regionAddress }, function(results, status) {
                if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
                    showMap(results[0].geometry.location);
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById("cityMap").style.display = 'none';
                }
            });
        }
        else
            showMap(coordinates)
    }

    function showMap(coordinates)
    {
        var mapOptions = {
            zoom: 10,
            center: coordinates,
            mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP
        };
        cityMap = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("cityMap"), mapOptions);
        for (var i = 0; i < hotelInd; i++) {
            if (!hotelCoordinates[i])
                break;
            var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
                map: cityMap,
                position: new google.maps.LatLng(hotelCoordinates[i].lat, hotelCoordinates[i].lng),
                title: hotelCoordinates[i].name
            });
            attachInfoWindowToMarker(marker, i);
        }
    }

    var currentInfoWindow = null;
    function attachInfoWindowToMarker(marker, i) {
        var contentString = hotelCoordinates[i].name + '<br><a href="/HotelsOne/PresHotel.aspx?hotelId=' + hotelCoordinates[i].id + '">Read more >>></a>';
        var infoWindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({
            content: contentString,
            maxWidth: 70,
            pixelOffset: new google.maps.Size(10, 10)
        });
        google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'click', function(event) {
            if (currentInfoWindow)
                currentInfoWindow.close();
            infoWindow.open(cityMap, marker);
            currentInfoWindow = infoWindow;
        });
    }
</script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    function showReview0(hotelId) {
        $find('mpeHotelReviews').show();
        $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = '';
        $get('spWait').style.display = 'block';
        var url = 'http://www.hoteladvisor.com/HotelsOne/HotelReviews.ascx?hotelId=' + hotelId + '&uiCulture=en&culture=en-US';
        var wRequest = new Sys.Net.WebRequest();
        wRequest.set_url(url);
        wRequest.set_httpVerb("GET");
        wRequest.invoke();
        wRequest.add_completed(function(executor, eventArgs) {
            if (executor.get_responseAvailable()) {
                $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = executor.get_responseData();
                $get('spWait').style.display = 'none';
            }
            else {
                $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = "No reviews found.";
                $get('spWait').style.display = 'none';
            }
        });
    }

    function showReview(hotelId) {
        var prevHotelId = $get('ctl04_hfReviews').value;
        if (prevHotelId != '' && prevHotelId == hotelId) {
            $find('ctl04_mpeHotelReviews').show();
        }
        else {
            $get('ctl04_upReviews').innerHTML = '';
            $find('ctl04_mpeHotelReviews').show();
            $get('ctl04_spWait').style.display = 'block';
            $get('ctl04_hfReviews').value = hotelId;
            //$get('ctl04_lbReviews').click(); // w firefoxie nie działa !!!
            __doPostBack('ctl04$lbReviews', '');
        }
    }

    Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_pageLoaded(pageLoaded);


    function pageLoaded(sender, args) {
        if (sender.get_isInAsyncPostBack()) {
            var arr = args.get_panelsUpdated();
            for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
                if (arr[i].id == 'ctl04_upReviews') {
                    $get('ctl04_spWait').style.display = 'none';
                }
            }
        }
    }    
    
</script>
